creator: djdiehl@us.ibm.com
text:
V2.0.20 had been installed and working. This morning the service would not 
start, although it did appear in "services" as installed, automatic status was 
blank, it would not start manually. Tried to uninstall and reinstall V2.0.40, 
now the service does not show up at all. The monitor shows "no service 
installed".

You can't install on the same port while another service is running.
  The service install verifies the port and config file are available.

  See http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/platform/win_service.html
  for information on installing the Apache2 service now, by hand.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
